mapper.select: SELECT instruct_date , prod_instruct_code , prod_instruct_status , prod_plan_code , users_code FROM prod_instruct WHERE instruct_date = TRUNC(SYSDATE)

SELECT prod_instruct_detail_code , pld.product_code , p.product_name , instruct_cnt , not_prod_cnt , prod_cnt , prod_instruct_code , mat_outgoing_status FROM prod_instruct_detail pid JOIN prod_plan_detail pld ON pid.prod_plan_detail_code = pld.prod_plan_detail_code JOIN product p ON pld.product_code = p.product_code WHERE prod_instruct_code = #{prodInstructCode} ORDER BY prod_instruct_detail_code

SELECT pr.serial_num , pr.proc_name , pr.eqm_code , pd.proc_detail_code , pd.proc_code , pd.begin_time , pd.end_time , pd.proc_status , pd.users_code , pd.prod_instruct_detail_code FROM proc_detail pd JOIN proc pr ON pd.proc_code = pr.proc_code WHERE pd.prod_instruct_detail_code = #{prodInstructDetailCode}

SELECT pm.proc_mat_code , pm.proc_detail_code , pm.mat_lot_code , m.mat_name , pm.mat_cnt FROM proc_mat pm JOIN proc_detail pcd ON pm.proc_detail_code = pcd.proc_detail_code JOIN mat_detail md ON pm.mat_lot_code = md.mat_lot_code JOIN mat m ON md.mat_code = m.mat_code WHERE pcd.proc_detail_code = #{procDetailCode} ORDER BY proc_mat_code
SELECT p.proc_code , p.serial_num , p.eqm_code , eqm_name , opr_status , eqm_status FROM eqm e JOIN proc p ON e.eqm_code = p.eqm_code WHERE eqm_status != 'ES5' ORDER BY p.serial_num

SELECT eqm_code , eqm_name , eqm_status , opr_status FROM eqm WHERE eqm_name LIKE REGEXP_REPLACE(#{eqmName}, '[0-9]+', '') || '%' AND eqm_status != 'ES5'
ORDER BY eqm_code

SELECT instruct_date , prod_instruct_code , prod_instruct_status , users_code FROM prod_instruct
TRUNC(instruct_date) >= TRUNC(#{searchStartDate})
AND TRUNC(instruct_date) <= TRUNC(#{searchEndDate})
AND prod_instruct_code LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{prodInstructCode}) || '%'
AND prod_instruct_status = 'IS3'
ORDER BY prod_instruct_code DESC

SELECT pid.prod_instruct_detail_code , pld.product_code , p.product_name , instruct_cnt , not_prod_cnt , prod_cnt , pd.product_lot_code --완제품lot코드 , pd.warehousing_cnt - pd.check_done_cnt as fail_cnt --불량수량 , prod_instruct_code FROM prod_instruct_detail pid JOIN prod_plan_detail pld ON pid.prod_plan_detail_code = pld.prod_plan_detail_code JOIN product p ON pld.product_code = p.product_code JOIN proc_result pr ON pr.prod_instruct_detail_code = pid.prod_instruct_detail_code JOIN product_detail pd ON pd.proc_result_code = pr.proc_result_code WHERE prod_instruct_code = #{prodInstructCode} ORDER BY prod_instruct_detail_code
